channel.title: Time Series on DS by SJ
channel.description: Recent content in Time Series on DS by SJ

item.title: Time for Time Series
item.description: Hello again! This time we are going to look at data visualization in the form of time series! A time series is similar to a scatterplot, in the way that it has two sets of data against each other. However, one of those sets of data is time. Let’s get started! library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) We will look at Babe Ruth’s homeruns over his twenty-two seasons. Here is the sql request:
